name: SENRAN KAGURA Burst Re:Newal
description: Experience the original SENRAN KAGURA Burst, the beginning of the world's best-loved buxom battle series, like never before! Tackle the classic ninja brawler from a whole new perspective in gorgeous, fluid HD, with new features and mechanics throughout!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.8GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
